item.description:
All Line Dance participants will report to the back of the stadium by 12:00pm Sunday Aug. 22nd. Upon arrival at the ballpark, you should follow the sidewalk around the hotel where you will be greeted by Fisher Cats staff members at the back of the ballpark. There is no parking out back. Parking information and directions to the ballpark are available by going to the following link. http://www.nhfisherca...
If you haven`t yet bought a ticket and would like to, you can purchase tickets through the following link: https://www.ticketret... simply type in the special offer code "Rodeo, RODEO or rodeo" Proceeds will be donated to Food for Children organization.
YOU NEED TO HAVE THE TICKET TO PARTICIPATE IN THE DANCE ON THE FIELD
The game start time is 1:35. Tom Dixon will be playing outside the bar before and after the game.

Come join us for a worthy cause.....proceeds go to Food for Children. Donations accepted at the field.
item.name: Longest Line Dance
